div.p: BIRTHDAY, I THINK. NO, 17th BIRTHDAY GOING INTO THE
18th YEAR. AS TIME WHIZZES BY AND CHRISTMAS
APPROACHES I AM HOPING AMERICAN COMPANIES WILL HELP THOSE IN
NEED. YESTERDAY A SMALL BUSINESS OUT
OF CHICAGO WELDBEN MADE A LARGE DONATION TO HELP WOUNDED VET WHO
IS NEED WHEELCHAIRS. THE CHECK TO INDEPENDENCE
FUND.ORG WILL CHANGE THE LIVES OF MEN AND WOMEN.
WE APPLAUD THEM. ANOTHER SMALL BUSINESS,
CHRISTMAS CLASSICS LTD, WILL DONATE 25% OF EVERYTHING THEY
SELL FOR CHRISTMAS TO THE FISCHER HOUSE CHARITY WHICH
HELPS FAMILIES OF WOUNDED VETS. RUN BY RONALD CLANCY.
IT’S DOING WHAT I HOPE OTHER COMPANIES WILL DO.
THEY SELL CHRISTMAS MUSIC AND GIVE BACK.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. THERE ARE MANY PEOPLE SUFFERING
IN AMERICA NOW. THINK ABOUT THEM, PLEASE.
PLAN SOME OF YOUR CHRISTMAS ACTIVITIES TO HELP THEM.
ALL THE MONEY I GET FROM BILL O’REILLY.COM IS DONATED TO
CHARITY. CHRISTMAS IS A GREAT TIME FOR
DOING THINGS LIKE THAT. THAT’S IT FOR US TONIGHT.
CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS FACTOR WEBSITE.
ALSO WE’D LIKE YOU TO SPOUT OFF ABOUT THE FACTOR ANYWHERE IN THE
